mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Waybill (shipping_orders_id, vehicle_num, product_id, uid, shipping_orders_detail_id) VALUES (#{shippingOrdersId}, #{vehicleNum}, #{productId}, #{uid}, #{shippingOrdersDetailId})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT w.shipping_orders_id AS shippingOrdersId, so.uid AS uid, so.postcode AS postcode, so.street_name_address AS streetNameAddress, so.street_number_address AS streetNumberAddress, so.detail_address AS detailAddress, sod.product_id AS productId, sod.quantity AS quantity, p.category_id AS categoryId, p.name AS productName, p.brand AS productBrand, p.volume AS productVolume, v.num AS vehicleNum, v.dname AS driverName, v.dphone AS driverPhone, v.type AS vehicleType FROM Waybill w JOIN Shipping_Orders so ON w.shipping_orders_id = so.id JOIN Dispatch d ON w.shipping_orders_id = d.shipping_orders_id JOIN Shipping_Orders_Detail sod ON w.shipping_orders_id = sod.shipping_orders_id JOIN Product p ON sod.product_id = p.id JOIN Vehicle v ON d.vehicle_num = v.num WHERE w.shipping_orders_id = #{shippingOrdersId}
